title: The Country Mouse and the City Mouse Adventures
overview: Clever country mouse Emily and her sophisticated city mouse cousin Alexander travel the globe in search of mystery and excitement when the all-new animated family series, The Country Mouse and the City Mouse Adventures. The 52-episode series debuts new editions every Saturday and Sunday.Traveling the world in the Victorian era, Emily and Alexander help out friends and relatives in need, battle eccentric villains, and escape hair-raising predicaments, in the process discovering exciting new people, places and cultures. The mice originally appeared on HBO in the 1993 animated musical tale, The Country Mouse and the City Mouse: A Christmas Tale.
